segments.text: What about the trip ? Do you enjoy yourself ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we had a good time . The trip was terrific . We toured the Three Gorges by boat . Its realty exciting !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did your boat float down the river ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . There are many places where the gorge is very narrow , with steep cliffs on both sides .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but we have life jackets . And we got a real kick out of that .
segments.speaker: S2
